papers.title: The Impact of Artificial Intelligence on Labor Markets: Evidence from Manufacturing

papers.abstract: This paper examines the effects of AI adoption on employment and wages in manufacturing sectors.

papers.title: Climate Change and Economic Growth: A Global Analysis
papers.abstract: We analyze the relationship between climate change indicators and economic growth across countries.

papers.abstract: Analysis of Finland's UBI experiment and its effects on employment and well-being.

papers.abstract: Examining the long-term performance implications of ESG investment strategies.
